Remedies: 1. Apple Cider Vinegar (ACV) rinse: Use diluted ACV after shampooing to control oil and balance pH. 2. Lemon juice: Mix with water and apply to scalp to absorb excess oil. 3. Tea tree oil: Add few drops to clarifying shampoo to fight fungus. 4. Clay mask: Apply once a week to detoxify scalp.
Routine: 1. Wash scalp 3-4 times a week using a clarifying or balancing shampoo. 2. Avoid heavy conditioners on the scalp. 3. Rinse thoroughly to prevent product buildup. 4. Avoid excessive touching of hair and scalp. 5. Maintain an active lifestyle to manage stress.
